name: Fight me IRL
description:
You've been causing trouble online and told a bunch of people you wanted to fight them but there's no way you can fight off all those bullies! Avoid them while making your way to your destination. When they message you, do't forget to message them back, you don't want them to think you're weak or something!

Hi, i'm currently a highschool senior and this is my first real game! I would really appreciate if you would back my kickstarter for Fight Me IRL. Even sharing it with friends would be helpful.      I also made a feedback form HERE.  thanks!

Controls: use the arrow keys and space
